text: Oh, Ray.

text: oh hell yah. this is an alltime favourite. ker-blop ker-blop ker-blop

text: Couldnt he sterilise the hat? Rays heart would look [i]decent[/] in one of those.

name: saulbellow
text: Oh, I [dear html would you please italicize this?  i don't know much from fancy kinds of programming but i realy need to emphasize this point and i need your help]agree[okay that's all i needed thanks html!].

name: ted0phile
text:
Remember kids:

BBCode is brackets! [like this!]
HTML is sideways carrots!

name: st-elmos_fire
text: you have to equate brackets to some other object (preferably food) before they will understand you, maybe the closest is angular bananas, or non-food, bookshelves

name: carlyle
text: Wendy's burgers.

name: psquid
text: This comment is woefully under-chubbied.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Dr. Andretti strikes me as the kind of doctor who's not so committed to "ethics".

name: spinynorman
text: Kids are okay, I guess

name: cuddlefish
text: Dr Andretti does what he's payed to do. and ray is rich and eccentric.

name: cousinted
text: Ray's put five of Andretti's kids through college. Ivy Leagues.

name: luckypyjamas
text: well, Ray is sharing his riches with Dr. Andretti. His eccentric? not so much

name: epicurus
text: It is a real shame about the hat. That would have been SHARP.

name: zem
text: maybe that was the problem

name: bookofsand
text: "Children are pretty good, you know." It is clear that Ray does not give a shit about the children.

name: havenless
text: Dude has waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay too much money.

name: lechatbotte
text:
Be nice to have his worries!

Think of all the, uh, kids, we could help (or something something).

name: yogurtworld
text: ....yelled Leonidas.

name: paperboy_2000
text: Ray one-ups Bensington Butter's Christmas card from last year that pictured his family on a beach in Hawaii.  He one-ups it big time.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all of them up in a chopper as lava spews out of a volcano. yeah, it took sixteen tries and seventeen pilots to get it right as well as an extra bird to take the picture and another one with lights attached to it so his mom's fur doesn't look like dead throw-up.

name: zeroasalimit
text: Ray gets one over on Monte Cazzazza. :D

name: slanger
text: So I saw this strip one morning when I was really hungover, and I barfed in my mouth.

name: stuart
text: Yeah, this one makes me feel uncomfortable.

name: deusoma
text: The idea of holding my own beating heart in my hands is suddenly one of my top ten nightmares. 5/5 just for the OH GOD factor.

name: skiddyfisk
text: More doctors should get new clinics built by doing weird shit for rich eccentric people. I mean, if I was Bill Gates, I would SO do this.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i think you would be too busy being rich like Gates.

Ray, for whatever reason, does not have this problem.

maybe you are like Ray. maybe you are not.

who is to say. you are not rich.
and neither am i.

name: tekende
text: Ray is maybe a little stupid with his money.

name: dasilodavi
text: This one kind of makes me want to puke.

name: johnfen
text: Nothing deserves a 5/5 more than this

name: lawbot
text: Dear Lord, Ray.

name: hypoluxa
text: My chest is a little tight after reading this....

name: tim_simmons
text: i wouldn't even bother with christmas cards y'know. i would just create a news letter or something and send out the same picture of me every month to remind them that i was the guy who straight held his own heart in his hands

name: finemusk
text: if only!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Lyle: gta real bood weekend erorked out

name: hateandwar
text: That's a badass song, man.

name: tslothrop
text: Insane satan- and antique porn-derived wealth makes anything possible....

name: achilleselbow
text: At first I thought that Ray was donating his heart to some child. Then I realized he'd just donated money to the children's clinic so the doctor would take out his heart and let him hold it. Somehow, this made more sense.

name: hyetal
text: Ohhh...  I had always chalked this strip up to a dream sequence until this explanation.  Thank you, kind sir.

name: i_love_kate
text: Someone's been watching too much French Impressionist Cinemaaaaaaa!

name: direhaggis
text: Ray must be under enough local or ether-based anaesthetic to a few kids into cardiac arrest. The cat is still coherent and waiting for a polaroid. Ray gets things done.

name: giantants
text: Players can afford more things.

name: pogo
text: A comment left by pogo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, Latterman, Sal, dixiecupdrinker)

name: apocowarg
text: DiSaGrEeMeNt BoX

name: i_love_kate
text: Ray is covered in fur, and yet still wears a hair cap. Discuss.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Philippe is Five.

and that's the deal.

name: lowtrees
text: Ray is a great cat. You like to see a cat with imagination enough to spend his dough in  style.

name: lechatbotte
text:
Are cat hearts just tiny, or is it only Rays?

(I'll bet Nice Pete knows!)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Ray would forget he meant to take a picture of himself doing this.

name: lolsworth
text: The Cat's doctor tells him he cannot have his heart wear a hat.

name: rhadamanthus
text: I like to imagine an epilogue strip wherein they come to a compromise and the heart gets a miniature surgery cap.

name: tollschaft
text: ker-blop.
